Package io.micronaut.guides.core

Class DefaultWebsiteGenerator

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.DefaultWebsiteGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebsiteGenerator
@Internal @Singleton public class DefaultWebsiteGenerator extends Object implements WebsiteGenerator
Default implementation of the WebsiteGenerator interface. This class is responsible for generating a website from the specified input directory to the specified output directory.

      public void generate(@NonNull @NotNull @NonNull @NotNull File inputDirectory, @NonNull @NotNull @NonNull @NotNull File outputDirectory) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: WebsiteGenerator
      Generates the guides website assets from the contents of the input directory and writes it to the output directory.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface WebsiteGenerator
      Parameters:
      inputDirectory - the directory containing the source files for the website
      outputDirectory - the directory where the generated website will be written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during generation
